alert.note: Alert for Christian; Douglas; Greene; Stone; Taney; Webster (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 15 at 4:02PM CDT until April 15 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Springfield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Springfield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Webster County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Douglas County in southwestern Missouri... Northwestern Taney County in southwestern Missouri... Eastern Christian County in southwestern Missouri... East central Stone County in southwestern Missouri... Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Missouri... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 401 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Branson West, or near Branson, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ozark, Branson, Shepherd of the Hills State Park, Rogersville, Silver Dollar City, Sparta, Reeds Spring, Highlandville, Fordland, Indian Point, Branson West, Spokane, Oldfield, Elkhead, Chestnutridge, Bruner, Selmore, Keltner, Christian Center and Chadwick. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Christian; Douglas; Greene; Stone; Taney; Webster
